body_html: I guess one could sample from those elements that have inf with equal probability - but it is dodgy mathematically and you wouldn't have gradients, so you really are in a degenerate state. As we return integers, returning NaN isn't an option, unfortunately...
body_text: I guess one could sample from those elements that have inf with equal probability - but it is dodgy mathematically and you wouldn't have gradients, so you really are in a degenerate state. As we return integers, returning NaN isn't an option, unfortunately...
body: I guess one could sample from those elements that have `inf` with equal probability - but it is dodgy mathematically and you wouldn't have gradients, so you really are in a degenerate state. As we return integers, returning NaN isn't an option, unfortunately...
